### Column {width=50%}

```{r}

# Wrap the data in SharedData for Crosstalk interactivity
shared_nilt <- SharedData$new(nilt_historical_chart2, key = ~variable, group = "vars")

# Single-selection dropdown for 'variable'
filter_select(
  id = "var_filter",
  selected = "GBVSEXVA",
  label = "Select Variable",
  sharedData = shared_nilt,
  group = ~variable,
  multiple = FALSE   # Only allow one variable selection at a time
)

# Plotly interactive line chart
plot_ly(shared_nilt, 
        x = ~year, 
        y = ~percentage_yes, 
        color = ~gender, 
        type = 'scatter', 
        mode = 'lines+markers',
        hoverinfo = "text",
        text = ~paste("Year:", year,
                      "<br>Variable:", variable,
                      "<br>Gender:", gender,
                      "<br>Percentage Yes:", percentage_yes)) %>%
  layout(
    title = "Percentage Saying Yes Over Time",
    xaxis = list(
      title = "Year",
      showgrid = FALSE  
    ),
    yaxis = list(
      title = "Percentage Saying Yes",
      showgrid = FALSE  
    ),
    legend = list(title = list(text = "Gender"))
  )

```
